result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kelly B Martin

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Kelly B Martin in court by v/c from B.C. jail with attorney M. Joseph Rafferty in courtroom.  Frederick Ian Bourg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
This hearing involves Bayfield Co cases 16CF46, 15CF176, 15CF39.  Rafferty; waive PH in 16CF46 and 15CF176; post-arraignment in 15CF39.  Court finds def. waiving PH K&V; finds probable cause and def. is bound over for further proceedings.  DA files informations in 16CF46 and 15CF176.  Rafferty submits document re: ATR agreement for an out-of-county case for client; requests the Court modify bond conditions so she can go to halfway house as arranged by DOC.  DA Bourg responds; not ready today to address modification to bond.  Motion hearing scheduled for May 4, 2016 at 01:15 pm.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: This hearing is for 16CF46, 15CF39 and 16CF46.  Defendant Kelly B Martin appeared by v/c from B.C. jail within attorney M. Joseph Rafferty in court.  Frederick Ian Bourg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Rafferty, received complaint and waive reading; waive time limits for PH and request pre-PH STC be scheduled.  Working on a global resolution; probation working on ATR involving treatment; would like to address modification of bond once proofs are available; will present State with a stip and proposed order for the Court when appropriate.  Court; bond will continue.  Status conference scheduled for May 3, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Cases involved with this hearing:  16CF46, 15CF176, 15CF39.
Defendant Kelly B Martin in court by v/c from B.C. jail with attorney M. Joseph Rafferty in the courtroom.  Frederick Ian Bourg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Rafferty, not appointed on 15CF176 and 16CF46.  Asks 15CF39 be set for JT, not asking to w/d on this case; she may want just one Atty for all 3 cases.  Court discusses this issue with Ms. Martin.  She wants one attorney.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 28, 2016 at 08:05 am.

Defendant Kelly B Martin in court with attorney M. Joseph Rafferty.  Frederick Ian Bourg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
16CF46, 15CF39, 15CF176 heard at this time
Rafferty indicates to the Court he represents Ms. Martin on 15CF39, have not been asked to represent on other cases by SPD; SPD will make a decision on other two cases.  Asks all cases be brought in this Friday, 04-08-2016; Defendant to appear by v/c from jail.  Court orders bond to continue as previously set.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 8, 2016 at 08:30 am.
